entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SNOW SHOWERS, RAIN SHOWERS AND FREEZING RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT
